[{"id":"BPD-2557","entityId":"2-17240","jiraId":null,"field":[{"name":"projectShortName","value":"BPD"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"2557"},{"name":"summary","value":"Проблема со slick slider на небольшой ширине экрана"},{"name":"description","value":"

Все слайды должны быть в один ряд, по факту происходит это:

Данное поведение возникает только на небольшой ширине, типичной для планшетов в вертикальном расположении. Легко воспроизводится в хроме в режиме эмулятора:

"},{"name":"wikified","value":"true"},{"name":"created","value":"1540398227301"},{"name":"updated","value":"1540455128967"},{"name":"updaterName","value":"gvroganov"},{"name":"updaterFullName","value":"Georgy Roganov"},{"name":"reporterName","value":"aagolovanov"},{"name":"reporterFullName","value":"Alexander Golovanov"},{"name":"commentsCount","value":"0"},{"name":"votes","value":"0"},{"name":"markdown","value":"true"},{"name":"links","value":[{"value":"BPD-1567","type":"Subtask","role":"subtask of"}]},{"name":"Priority","value":["Major"],"valueId":["Major"],"color":{"bg":"#ffee9c","fg":"#b45f06"}},{"name":"Severity","value":["Normal"],"valueId":["Normal"],"color":{"bg":"#e6f6cf","fg":"#4da400"}},{"name":"Type","value":["Bug"],"valueId":["Bug"],"color":{"bg":"#8e1600","fg":"#fff"}},{"name":"Task type","value":["FrontEnd Dev."],"valueId":["FrontEnd Dev."],"color":{"bg":"#7dbd36","fg":"#fff"}},{"name":"State","value":["In Progress"],"valueId":["In Progress"],"color":{"bg":"#ff7bc3","fg":"#fff"}},{"name":"Assignee","value":[{"value":"rslykov","fullName":"Roman Lykov"}]},{"name":"Assingee QA","value":[{"value":"AEKordyukova","fullName":"AEKordyukova"}]},{"name":"Sprints","value":["Sprint 35","Sprint 36"],"valueId":["Sprint 35","Sprint 36"],"color":null},{"name":"attachments","value":[{"value":"image.png","id":"5-5153","url":"https://yt.dasreda.ru/_persistent/image.png?file=5-5153&c=true"},{"value":"image2.png","id":"5-5154","url":"https://yt.dasreda.ru/_persistent/image2.png?file=5-5154&c=true"}]}],"comment":[],"tag":[{"value":"120_SECONDS","cssClass":"c29"}]}, {"id":"BPD-2548","entityId":"2-17169","jiraId":null,"field":[{"name":"projectShortName","value":"BPD"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"2548"},{"name":"summary","value":"[GQL][Front] Доработать stages на портале"},{"name":"description","value":"

Ветка с текущими наработками - featue/BPD-1920-graphql-apollo-experiment

Задачи:

  • Смерджить с текущим develop
  • Сверить GQL реализацию карточек с текущей
  • Доработать недостающий функционал и ошибки
"},{"name":"wikified","value":"true"},{"name":"created","value":"1540307290888"},{"name":"updated","value":"1540314315364"},{"name":"updaterName","value":"gvroganov"},{"name":"updaterFullName","value":"Georgy Roganov"},{"name":"reporterName","value":"eaallenov"},{"name":"reporterFullName","value":"Eugene Allenov"},{"name":"commentsCount","value":"0"},{"name":"votes","value":"0"},{"name":"markdown","value":"true"},{"name":"links","value":[{"value":"BPD-2491","type":"Depend","role":"is required for"},{"value":"BPD-2491","type":"Subtask","role":"subtask of"}]},{"name":"Priority","value":["Major"],"valueId":["Major"],"color":{"bg":"#ffee9c","fg":"#b45f06"}},{"name":"Severity","value":["Normal"],"valueId":["Normal"],"color":{"bg":"#e6f6cf","fg":"#4da400"}},{"name":"Type","value":["Task"],"valueId":["Task"],"color":null},{"name":"State","value":["Approved"],"valueId":["Approved"],"color":{"bg":"#ffc8ea","fg":"#444"}},{"name":"Assignee","value":[{"value":"rslykov","fullName":"Roman Lykov"}]},{"name":"Assingee QA","value":[{"value":"AEKordyukova","fullName":"AEKordyukova"}]},{"name":"Sprints","value":["Sprint 35","Sprint 36"],"valueId":["Sprint 35","Sprint 36"],"color":null}],"comment":[],"tag":[]}, {"id":"BPD-2245","entityId":"2-15589","jiraId":null,"field":[{"name":"projectShortName","value":"BPD"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"2245"},{"name":"summary","value":"Вернуть в слайдер старые иконки"},{"name":"description","value":"

В слайдер попали иконки из 120 секунд, надо вернуть старые.

Иконки, которые пострадали: Операционное управление, Персонал, Привлечение клиентов, Продажи, Личная эффективность, Развитие бизнеса.

"},{"name":"wikified","value":"true"},{"name":"created","value":"1537188656735"},{"name":"updated","value":"1540215310742"},{"name":"updaterName","value":"gvroganov"},{"name":"updaterFullName","value":"Georgy Roganov"},{"name":"reporterName","value":"navilkov"},{"name":"reporterFullName","value":"Nikita Vilkov"},{"name":"commentsCount","value":"0"},{"name":"votes","value":"0"},{"name":"markdown","value":"true"},{"name":"links","value":[{"value":"BPD-729","type":"Subtask","role":"subtask of"}]},{"name":"Priority","value":["Normal"],"valueId":["Normal"],"color":{"bg":"#e6f6cf","fg":"#4da400"}},{"name":"Severity","value":["Normal"],"valueId":["Normal"],"color":{"bg":"#e6f6cf","fg":"#4da400"}},{"name":"Type","value":["Task"],"valueId":["Task"],"color":null},{"name":"Task type","value":["FrontEnd Dev."],"valueId":["FrontEnd Dev."],"color":{"bg":"#7dbd36","fg":"#fff"}},{"name":"State","value":["Approved"],"valueId":["Approved"],"color":{"bg":"#ffc8ea","fg":"#444"}},{"name":"Assignee","value":[{"value":"rslykov","fullName":"Roman Lykov"}]},{"name":"Assingee QA","value":[{"value":"AEKordyukova","fullName":"AEKordyukova"}]},{"name":"Sprints","value":["Sprint 36"],"valueId":["Sprint 36"],"color":null},{"name":"attachments","value":[{"value":"Снимок экрана 2018-09-13 в 18.58.29.png","id":"5-4528","url":"https://yt.dasreda.ru/_persistent/%D0%A1%D0%BD%D0%B8%D0%BC%D0%BE%D0%BA%20%D1%8D%D0%BA%D1%80%D0%B0%D0%BD%D0%B0%202018-09-13%20%D0%B2%2018.58.29.png?file=5-4528&c=true"}]}],"comment":[],"tag":[{"value":"Refactoring","cssClass":"c15"}]}, {"id":"BPD-2550","entityId":"2-17173","jiraId":null,"field":[{"name":"projectShortName","value":"BPD"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"2550"},{"name":"summary","value":"Сделать обработку ошибок получения данных в разделе событий"},{"name":"description","value":"

При возникновении ошибки ответа сервера на странице https://dev.dasreda.ru/events, отображается бесконечный прелоадер, а в интерфейсе нет уведомления об ошибке

"},{"name":"wikified","value":"true"},{"name":"created","value":"1540311328164"},{"name":"updated","value":"1540314423218"},{"name":"updaterName","value":"gvroganov"},{"name":"updaterFullName","value":"Georgy Roganov"},{"name":"reporterName","value":"rslykov"},{"name":"reporterFullName","value":"Roman Lykov"},{"name":"commentsCount","value":"0"},{"name":"votes","value":"0"},{"name":"markdown","value":"true"},{"name":"links","value":[{"value":"BPD-747","type":"Subtask","role":"subtask of"}]},{"name":"Priority","value":["Normal"],"valueId":["Normal"],"color":{"bg":"#e6f6cf","fg":"#4da400"}},{"name":"Severity","value":["Normal"],"valueId":["Normal"],"color":{"bg":"#e6f6cf","fg":"#4da400"}},{"name":"Type","value":["Bug"],"valueId":["Bug"],"color":{"bg":"#8e1600","fg":"#fff"}},{"name":"Task type","value":["FrontEnd Dev."],"valueId":["FrontEnd Dev."],"color":{"bg":"#7dbd36","fg":"#fff"}},{"name":"State","value":["Approved"],"valueId":["Approved"],"color":{"bg":"#ffc8ea","fg":"#444"}},{"name":"Assignee","value":[{"value":"rslykov","fullName":"Roman Lykov"}]},{"name":"Assingee QA","value":[{"value":"AEKordyukova","fullName":"AEKordyukova"}]},{"name":"Sprints","value":["Sprint 36"],"valueId":["Sprint 36"],"color":null}],"comment":[],"tag":[]}, {"id":"BPD-2565","entityId":"2-17291","jiraId":null,"field":[{"name":"projectShortName","value":"BPD"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"2565"},{"name":"summary","value":"Не выводить нотификацию об отсутствии контента там где он по факту есть"},{"name":"description","value":"

При нажатии на кнопку подкатегории в этапах и знаниях (в 120 секундах все вроде, но лучше проверить), на секунду появляется сообщение об отсутствии контента в подкатегории, хотя по факту контент просто еще не загрузился.

Сообщение не должно отображаться если контент есть, нужно дождаться ответа с сервера и убедиться что в разделе ничего нет прежде чем отображать алерт.

"},{"name":"wikified","value":"true"},{"name":"created","value":"1540471274989"},{"name":"updated","value":"1540481488673"},{"name":"updaterName","value":"gvroganov"},{"name":"updaterFullName","value":"Georgy Roganov"},{"name":"reporterName","value":"aagolovanov"},{"name":"reporterFullName","value":"Alexander Golovanov"},{"name":"commentsCount","value":"0"},{"name":"votes","value":"0"},{"name":"markdown","value":"true"},{"name":"links","value":[{"value":"BPD-2457","type":"Relates","role":"relates to"},{"value":"BPD-729","type":"Subtask","role":"subtask of"}]},{"name":"Priority","value":["Normal"],"valueId":["Normal"],"color":{"bg":"#e6f6cf","fg":"#4da400"}},{"name":"Severity","value":["Minor"],"valueId":["Minor"],"color":{"bg":"#e6e6e6","fg":"#888"}},{"name":"Type","value":["Bug"],"valueId":["Bug"],"color":{"bg":"#8e1600","fg":"#fff"}},{"name":"Task type","value":["FrontEnd Dev."],"valueId":["FrontEnd Dev."],"color":{"bg":"#7dbd36","fg":"#fff"}},{"name":"State","value":["Approved"],"valueId":["Approved"],"color":{"bg":"#ffc8ea","fg":"#444"}},{"name":"Assignee","value":[{"value":"rslykov","fullName":"Roman Lykov"}]},{"name":"Assingee QA","value":[{"value":"AEKordyukova","fullName":"AEKordyukova"}]},{"name":"Sprints","value":["Sprint 36"],"valueId":["Sprint 36"],"color":null},{"name":"attachments","value":[{"value":"2018-10-25 15.33.15.gif","id":"5-5178","url":"https://yt.dasreda.ru/_persistent/2018-10-25%2015.33.15.gif?file=5-5178&c=true"}]}],"comment":[],"tag":[]}, {"id":"BPD-2501","entityId":"2-16937","jiraId":null,"field":[{"name":"projectShortName","value":"BPD"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"2501"},{"name":"summary","value":"Проблема отображения компонента в FF"},{"name":"description","value":"

У компонента CompanyBusinessCard, на кнопке, не отображается логотип компании

Такую ситуацию можно наблюдать на странице лайфхака

"},{"name":"wikified","value":"true"},{"name":"created","value":"1539705620587"},{"name":"updated","value":"1540215453599"},{"name":"updaterName","value":"gvroganov"},{"name":"updaterFullName","value":"Georgy Roganov"},{"name":"reporterName","value":"rslykov"},{"name":"reporterFullName","value":"Roman Lykov"},{"name":"commentsCount","value":"0"},{"name":"votes","value":"0"},{"name":"markdown","value":"true"},{"name":"links","value":[{"value":"BPD-729","type":"Subtask","role":"subtask of"}]},{"name":"Priority","value":["Minor"],"valueId":["Minor"],"color":{"bg":"#e6e6e6","fg":"#888"}},{"name":"Severity","value":["Normal"],"valueId":["Normal"],"color":{"bg":"#e6f6cf","fg":"#4da400"}},{"name":"Type","value":["Bug"],"valueId":["Bug"],"color":{"bg":"#8e1600","fg":"#fff"}},{"name":"Task type","value":["FrontEnd Dev."],"valueId":["FrontEnd Dev."],"color":{"bg":"#7dbd36","fg":"#fff"}},{"name":"State","value":["Approved"],"valueId":["Approved"],"color":{"bg":"#ffc8ea","fg":"#444"}},{"name":"Assignee","value":[{"value":"rslykov","fullName":"Roman Lykov"}]},{"name":"Assingee QA","value":[{"value":"AEKordyukova","fullName":"AEKordyukova"}]},{"name":"Sprints","value":["Sprint 36"],"valueId":["Sprint 36"],"color":null},{"name":"attachments","value":[{"value":"image.png","id":"5-5038","url":"https://yt.dasreda.ru/_persistent/image.png?file=5-5038&c=true"}]}],"comment":[],"tag":[{"value":"Refactoring","cssClass":"c15"}]}, {"id":"BPD-2514","entityId":"2-16986","jiraId":null,"field":[{"name":"projectShortName","value":"BPD"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"2514"},{"name":"summary","value":"Коррекция стилей информационного сообщения"},{"name":"description","value":"

Информационное сообщение должно быть в оттенках синего (@blue: hsl(199, 100%, 50.4%);). Так же необходимо скруглить углы (5px)

"},{"name":"wikified","value":"true"},{"name":"created","value":"1539784028877"},{"name":"updated","value":"1540215475753"},{"name":"updaterName","value":"gvroganov"},{"name":"updaterFullName","value":"Georgy Roganov"},{"name":"reporterName","value":"rslykov"},{"name":"reporterFullName","value":"Roman Lykov"},{"name":"commentsCount","value":"0"},{"name":"votes","value":"0"},{"name":"markdown","value":"true"},{"name":"links","value":[{"value":"BPD-729","type":"Subtask","role":"subtask of"}]},{"name":"Priority","value":["Minor"],"valueId":["Minor"],"color":{"bg":"#e6e6e6","fg":"#888"}},{"name":"Severity","value":["Normal"],"valueId":["Normal"],"color":{"bg":"#e6f6cf","fg":"#4da400"}},{"name":"Type","value":["Task"],"valueId":["Task"],"color":null},{"name":"Task type","value":["FrontEnd Dev."],"valueId":["FrontEnd Dev."],"color":{"bg":"#7dbd36","fg":"#fff"}},{"name":"State","value":["Approved"],"valueId":["Approved"],"color":{"bg":"#ffc8ea","fg":"#444"}},{"name":"Assignee","value":[{"value":"rslykov","fullName":"Roman Lykov"}]},{"name":"Assingee QA","value":[{"value":"AEKordyukova","fullName":"AEKordyukova"}]},{"name":"Sprints","value":["Sprint 36"],"valueId":["Sprint 36"],"color":null},{"name":"attachments","value":[{"value":"image.png","id":"5-5057","url":"https://yt.dasreda.ru/_persistent/image.png?file=5-5057&c=true"}]}],"comment":[],"tag":[{"value":"Refactoring","cssClass":"c15"}]}, {"id":"BPD-2522","entityId":"2-17052","jiraId":null,"field":[{"name":"projectShortName","value":"BPD"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"2522"},{"name":"summary","value":"Обновить бейджи подкатегорий на странице категорий и на странице сервисов"},{"name":"description","value":"

Обновить бейджи подкатегорий на странице категорий и на странице сервисов:
Должны быть как на картинке во вложении. Уже реализовано так на 120.
